actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to repeal the Community Economic Development Act of 1981 and the Community Services Block Grant Act.

summary.text: Repeals the Community Economic Development Act of 1981 and all provisions of the Community Services Block Grant Act except provisions that repealed parts of the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964. Transfers moneys in the Rural Development Loan Fund and the Community Development Loan Fund and moneys repaid on loans to community economic development programs to the general fund of the Treasury.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the Community Economic Development Act of 1981 and the Community Services Block Grant Act.
